## Clear Workspace

It is always a good idea to start by cleaning the workspace environment to avoid troubles that might be caused by variables created in other files

```{r}
#| results: 'hide'

rm(list = ls())
```

## Install Unavailable Packages

```{r}
#| results: 'hide'

packages = c("wordcloud2", "here")
install.packages(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages())))
```

## Load Packages

```{r results='hide', message=FALSE}
#| results: 'hide'
#| message: FALSE

lapply(packages, require, character.only = TRUE)
```

## Load Dataset

Load some data to visualize.

```{r}
ds <- read.csv(here("data", "msg.csv"))
```

## Visualize Dataset

Visualize data as a wordcloud. The wordcloud will have different colors and alignments each run.

```{r}
wordcloud2(data=ds, shape = "cardioid")
```
